scenario_text.value: Hwhaaaaaa?!
AAAAAAAAAH!
What is this thing?!

Hey, that’s my line!
...Wait, you’re—!
It...talks?!
Shoo! Back off, dang it!

I’ve never seen anything like this before.
What the heck is it?!
Seriously, what’s this thing’s deal?!

I’m not a “thing”!
I’m Koromon!
I’ve been waiting for ya, ole buddy ole pal!
Koro...mon?

Sorry, but that “pal” talk rubs me the wrong
way. The name’s Takuma, okay?
Anyway, just back off for a sec, will you?!

Takuma... That’s your name?
Nice to meet ya, Takuma!
That doesn’t answer my question!
No, more importantly...
What do you mean, you were waiting for me?
Yeah, for ages! Like, such a long time, pal!
Why? How?

Well that’s easy! You see, uh...
Uhhh...
Hey, why WAS I waiting?!
That’s what I want to know!

(What’s with this thing... It understands me,
but I wouldn’t call this a conversation...)

(Anyway, it doesn’t seem to mean me any
harm...I think.)

You took the words right out of my mouth.
At any rate, I see you’re not human.

That’s what I am, a human. Still only a child,
though.

A human...child? I’ve never seen one before.
You’re kinda weird-looking, aren’t ya!
Still, I’m glad I got to meet ya! Mmm hmmm!

I’ve been craving something, ya see...
I’ve been waiting forever and ever!
Craving...? What do you mean?

Anyway! You’re the one for me! It’s like I’ve
been waiting for you forever!

What do you mean?
I don’t get it...

And anyway, this’s been bugging me for
a while now...
Listen up, uh...Koromon, was it?

Stop treating me like some kid, all right?!
I’m already in junior high!
What’s a “jun-yerrr hai”?
Well, uh... It basically means I’m an adult!
Huh. But you just said yourself you’re a child!

Ugh! That wasn’t what I meant!
Anyway, I’m not a kid—
You totally are!

Why else would you get upset over every
little thing?

Shut up!
I’ve had enough! Back off, already!
Wait, Takumaaa!

(First things first, I’ve gotta shake off
this weird critter somehow!)
(I’ll try and get away from the shrine.)
